headline: Philip Morris International Extends Growth Outlook As Smoke Free Shift Accelerates
summary: Philip Morris International (NYSE:PM) reaffirmed its multi-year growth guidance. The company reported that smoke free products now account for more than 40% of total revenue. Management highlighted ongoing investment in reduced risk offerings and product development. Philip Morris International is trading at $181.83, with the share price up 1.1% over the past week and 11.8% over the past month. The stock is also up 13.4% year to date and 28.4% over the past year, while the 5 year return is...

headline: Needham Maintains Buy on Philip Morris Intl, Raises Price Target to $205
summary: Needham  analyst Gerald Pascarelli   maintains Philip Morris Intl (NYSE:PM) with a Buy and raises the price target from $190 to $205.
